headline: Chinese Stir-Fried Egg and Tomato
name: Chinese Stir-Fried Egg and Tomato
description: Eggs, tomatoes, and green onions combine to make this simple and surprisingly delicious vegetarian stir-fry that's a staple in Chinese cuisine.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add eggs and green onions. Cook and stir until eggs are nearly set, about 10 seconds. Immediately scrape eggs into a bowl.

Add tomatoes to the skillet. Saute, stirring occasionally, until juices are released and tomatoes are slightly wilted, about 5 minutes. Add salt and sugar; stir to mix well. Return eggs to skillet and cook, stirring occasionally, until eggs are set, 2 to 3 minutes.
